1.content:
It was more than you could handle.

The sight of other people eating each other at one point or another turned you so on that you could barely satisfy yourself through masturbation. The very thought of people sliding down your throat pleased you to no end...that was your drug, your heroin.

And yet, things changed so suddenly.

It all started when your best friend got unbirthed. Not by you, but by a buxom teacher. At first you furiously attempted to get your rocks off, but then you stopped.


When she came back out, she wouldn't be the same person you were friends with. She'd be...different. Changed. Like a part of her somehow died and was replaced with an artificial memory.


That's when it hit you; the pure, raw force of what exactly you were beating off to.

You were masturbating to your own friend's "death," and possibly those of others as well.


You stepped back and faced the monster you had let yourself become.


What have I done? You asked yourself.


That was when you realized some of the people in this school didn't always come back. They didn't always reform in the nurse's office like they should have all because someone forgot to drink their reform potion. They became sperm. They regressed to mere fetuses, perhaps even beyond that. They became breast milk.




By God, you swore that you would get out of this place. By hook or by crook, you would escape this miserable lifestyle and become a functioning member of society.



You must escape this crazy, psychotic school, one way or the other.




That being said...what are you?
1.title: IT BEGINS.AVI

choices: During math class--no one pays attention, anyhow.
During chemistry--an explosion should create a nice distraction...
11.content:
Fate has not been as kind to you as it has been to others, it seems.


For starters, you're male. That alone boosts the odds of you not escaping this place in one piece.

And you wondered why you saw so few guys during orientation...


It is concerning, yes, but that doesn't mean you cannot succeed merely because you are of the hunted. It just lessens your odds of success.


No matter. You will--no, you must escape from this dreadful place and warn others to stay away!


All that matters is that you choose when...
11.title: Cursed by Mars

choices: Get connections with the other students and try and form a joint escape.
Find a way to reverse the effects of vore/unbirth then sneak away in a stomach.
Exercise and focus on getting in shape by any means necessary.
115.content:
Now, most people would think that this is the worst time to attempt escape but in actual fact it is probably the best.

After all, their guard would be down and as long as you weren’t ‘volunteered’, you should have no problem escaping as this was the class which everyone tried in at least those who survive.

Now as for the plan, the class is an empty room with crash mats and has 3 exits. 1 at the north east, 1 at the south and 1 at the north west. The north east door is locked at all times but the other 2 lead into the corridors. The windows are to high for you to reach easily.

The best option would probably be to go for the door to the north west as it is often out of sight of the teacher and leads to a maze of corridors that do lead to the outside world.
However if you got lock-picks that other door leads straight out into the yard.

Now that class is on Friday so you have 5 days to prepare. You also have enough time to get revenge on that teacher/ maybe get your friend back?. What do you do to prepare?
115.title: During a vore class--almost impossible...almost.

1153.content:
Cursed by Mars, huh. Well not in this case for this plan can only be done effectively by the male body.

After doing some research you find Men can typically gain muscle mass and get stronger much quicker than women as a lot more of the energy in their body is optimized in fat to feed not only them but the soul inside them when they are pregnant.

So you should have it easy then right. Well there is 1 issue you need to tackle: food.

Although the school dinners give you enough to survive in order to build up your muscle mass in time, your going to need to eat something bigger.

Now this is a bit daunting but with the right amount of preparation it shouldn’t backfire. At the end of the day you’re going to a vore class so you’ll need the practice anyway but who will you eat. Teachers will give you more energy but Students will be easier to eat and burn off the calories.

So which one?
1153.title: Exercise and focus on getting in shape by any m...

choices: Slip away unseen before morning call--though others might notice you're gone...
Sneak out before lights-out--tricky, but it's doable...as long as you plan ahead
Better escapes through smoke bombs--call in the chem club!
The vents seem logical--after all, what works in the movies...
Just leg it--let none stop you!
12.content:
Thank God you were born female. It makes it so much easier to escape...not by much, but it's enough to give you a fair shot.

You have a nice neckline, D-cup breasts, you're lean...you. Are. HOT.


No two shits about it, you were blessed with good looking genes.


Though many have you pegged as a nice addition to their own bodies (or even their own families), there is nothing stopping you from just waltzing out the front doors naked.



Of course, it never is easy.

After all...timing is everything.
12.title: Blessed by Venus

choices: You can't fit and get stuck!
124.content: You see the purple paper leaflings blowing fresh cool air into the room. This seems like a route out of the way of most of the students and you drag a desk so you can reach it. You climb on the chair and pop off the vent grate and start to enter but then...
124.title: The vents seem logical--after all, what works i...

1241.content:
The door to the room unlocks with a loud click and you kick your legs frantically trying to get into the vents. You hear the door creak open and the teacher walks in. Immediately you hear her laughing and saying "God has declared today is helpless prey day!"

She laughs hard and you can hear the various "glorps" and "gurgles" as someone is fighting within her. You can feel your face turn beet red and she yells to you "Get out of there student and let me see the pretty little smile!"

At first you want to defy her and squeeze your way in but maybe things will go better if you just went down...
1241.title: A teacher catches you!

12411.content:
You have already been caught so no point in trying to escape her grasp. Hell maybe she will let you go but you may meet the same fate as the student(s?) within her. With a hard thud on the wooden desk and your rum you back out of the vent and the teacher smiles with her rosy red lips glistening in the light.

"Ahhhh look at you missy. Aren't you just scrumptious! No wonder you were trying to escape weren't you, not with those plump breasts you won't!" She applied a new coat of saliva over her lips as she looked you over. Looking at her enormous belly girth you could see that several students were trapped in her already, if your years analyzing this school you would say about 4.

"Oh looking at me a bit now aren't you. Well I am in quite a predicament here, if I get you inside me I will beat that math teachers record but I couldn't eat another bite even if I wanted to. What do you think?
12411.title: Confront the teacher.

choices: Hell yeah this teacher couldn't get me if she wanted to!
Maybe submitting on my own means...
124112.content: The teacher starts laughing again, "Haha even if I did let you go you are still going to be eaten by someone out in those halls! Plus I said I couldn't EAT another bite, my pussy is plenty ready and so is my ass." Previous students trapped within her struggle for escape as she taunts her next potential prey. You can hear their helpless gasps for air as their bodies slide past each other in the pool of acids in her stomach. Imagining your own clothes soaking wet as you would soon end up trapped in someone if not this teacher but maybe you could last...
124112.title: Let me go!

1243.content:
You crawl in and feel yourself getting freer and freer! Nothing can stop you now!

Soon your adrenaline wears off and you realize the duct work has only been this stable because of how tiny you are. But you were lucky. You need to find a new plan.

You look down the next three vents coming up.

The first one is a class currently teaching vore class. Although it looks like the teacher is eating the students. Unlikely she'll digest them all just to get you.

The next is a girl sitting all alone reading in a room. Shes got her headphones in too. It would be so easy to just eat her and run.

The last is the nurses office. You've heard stories that no one that goes in there for any reason ever comes out. And seeing the nurse. Seven feet tall, breasts so large they could literally catch you, and g-d knows what else below. Who knows how that would end up?
1243.title: Nothing...

choices: You are a student's mother who is in to unbirth.
15.content:
You're...not a student, then?

Not even a teacher?


Well, this is interesting...


Ok, so the question still stands.

What are you, oh dear reader?
15.title: Someone else, then?

info.brief_description: For whatever reason, you must Escape From Vore High! Try not to end up in someone's gut.
info.description:
This is just like other vore/unbirth interactive stories, but with a twist:

You're trying to run away from the people who are going to eat you!


As such, a few rules:

0. SPELLCHECK MOTHERFUCKERS. USE IT.

0a. ALSO, POST WITH SUBSTANCE. THAT MEANS >5 WORDS.

0b. SAME WITH GRAMMAR. CHECK IT FIVE THOUSAND TIMES, IF YOU MUST.

1. You are and always MUST BE THE PREY. Remember, the people with growling bellies are going to gobble you up without so much as an afterthought. I understand that some of you may want to fight fire with fire, but too often it will blow up in your face.

1a. That being said, ALL THE "BASIC" TYPES OF VORE (UB, CV, AV, ORAL) ARE WELCOME. There are many ways for you to fail!

1b. Also, keep the vore soft!

2. Try and keep your chapters coherent, people.

3. Furries? In my interactive? NOPE.AVI

3a. Seriously, I do enjoy furries...but they have no place here in this interactive.

3b. Same goes for GT/GTS. None of that, now!

4. If you add a branch of choices that ends in digestion, BE SURE TO INVITE THE PLAYER TO GO BACK AND START THE BRANCH AGAIN, PREFERABLY FROM A DIFFERENT POINT. You know what they say about doors closing and opening.

4a. On that note, AGE REGRESSION IS ALLOWED, BUT SEE #4.

5. You, too, have the ability to vore and/or unbirth, but see #1. You're THE VICTIM.

5a. If you end up digesting/regressing people, it will lessen the chances of you escaping from Vore High because you'll be wasting time you could be spending by formulating an escape plan, so beware and stay sharp!

6. Herms are and always will be welcome, and you can play as one! Just remember that you're prey, ok?

6a. That being said, try not to turn half the damn interactive into a gigantic CV fest.

7. I RESERVE THE RIGHT TO EDIT CHAPTERS WITHOUT PERMISSION (though usually I'll give you a head's up).

8. The Main Character is assumed to be 18+, however, due to the nature of the subject matter, you may end up becoming someone's new child--or lunch!

8a. That being said, all other characters are assumed to be 16-18+. So, to put it into perspective, this would be a "Minor1" tag on AdultFanfiction.net
